title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the RFCImplementationMonitor platform.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema to store RFC data, implementation progress, and stakeholder information.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services for managing RFCs, tracking implementation progress, and providing status updates.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for stakeholders to view RFC implementation progress and status updates.

title: Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up the CI/CD pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment of the RFCImplementationMonitor platform.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, integration, and performance testing of the platform.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the platform.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation and user guides for the RFCImplementationMonitor platform.

title: Deployment and Go-Live
description: Deploy the RFCImplementationMonitor platform to production and ensure a smooth go-live process.
